memory
Class MemoryState

java.lang.Object
  environment.AbstractTwoPlayerState
      memory.MemoryState
All Implemented Interfaces:
IState, ITwoPlayerState, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class MemoryState
extends AbstractTwoPlayerState

A state for the Memory game gathers a lot of information :

  • The list of known cards (with links to find their position on the board).
  • The list of the positions of unknown cards.
  • The number of turns.
  • The score of each player.

Author:
Francesco De Comite
See Also:
